name: part_008
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3D新ビジュアルお披露目】お待たせ！！君に早く会いたかったよ！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [BB2zYMB-1G4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and her guests (Noel, Miko, Polka, Suisei) are on stage. Flare suggests that they act as photographers for a 'photo session' since it's an unveiling event.
The photo session begins, and the guests discuss who is best at taking photos. Sakura Miko is nominated as the 'President' of photography.
The group discusses what poses Flare should strike. Flare suggests lying down.
Flare performs a series of relaxing and seductive poses on the floor while the others enthusiastically take photos.
Sakura Miko joins Flare for a selfie, and they pose together with excitement.
Hoshimachi Suisei takes the lead in directing Flare's poses, focusing on different angles and a spin.
Suisei and Flare pose together back-to-back for a series of photos directed by Polka.
Omaru Polka directs Flare for more close-up and expressive poses, including heart shapes and hand-under-chin gestures.

subtitles.original: なので、
subtitles.english: So,

subtitles.original: あの、いつものライブ形式をとったんですけど、
subtitles.english: well, I took the usual live concert format,

subtitles.original: お披露目なので、
subtitles.english: but since it's an unveiling,

subtitles.original: ちょっと、せっかくならみんなにね、ちょっとカメラをやっていただこうかな、と思っております。
subtitles.english: I thought I'd have everyone take on the role of photographers, if you're up for it.

subtitles.original: なるほど。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: 了解でございます。
subtitles.english: Roger that.

subtitles.original: 俺がカメラになるぜ！
subtitles.english: I'll be the camera!

subtitles.original: 了解です！
subtitles.english: Roger!

subtitles.original: お前がカメラになるのか！
subtitles.english: You're going to be the camera!?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ちなみに、お写真お得意な方はどなたですか？
subtitles.english: By the way, who here is good at taking photos?

subtitles.original: そうだ、ピンボケしちゃうな。
subtitles.english: That's right, they might end up blurry.

subtitles.original: はい！はい！みこち！みこち！みこちに任せろ！部長が！
subtitles.english: Me! Me! Mikochi! Mikochi! Leave it to Mikochi! The President!

subtitles.original: お、じゃあ部長、ありがてえ、任せた部長！
subtitles.english: Oh, then President, thanks, I'm counting on you, President!

subtitles.original: 任せて！
subtitles.english: Leave it to me!

subtitles.original: ではでは。どんなところにこだわるのかな、部長は。
subtitles.english: Well then. I wonder what the President will focus on.

subtitles.original: 社長、なんかポーズとか取ってくれるんですか、社長。
subtitles.english: CEO, are you going to strike some poses, CEO?

subtitles.original: え、何？どんなの？
subtitles.english: Eh, what? What kind?

subtitles.original: 寝ればいい？
subtitles.english: Should I lie down?

subtitles.original: 寝てくれるの？
subtitles.english: You're going to lie down?

subtitles.original: 寝ればいいの？
subtitles.english: Is lying down okay?

subtitles.original: 寝るの！？
subtitles.english: You're lying down!?

subtitles.original: あの、跪いてもらって、
subtitles.english: Um, could you kneel down,

subtitles.original: いいよ。ちょっと、社長！社長！隠して！隠して！誰か！
subtitles.english: Okay. Wait, CEO! CEO! Hide her! Hide her! Someone!

subtitles.original: 違うの、だめだよ！見て、見て。
subtitles.english: No, it's not like that! Look, look.

subtitles.original: そうそう、今日、黒塗りで。
subtitles.english: Right, right, it's blacked out today.

subtitles.original: いいな、そういう、ちょっと寛いでる感じで。
subtitles.english: Nice, that kind of, like you're relaxing.

subtitles.original: あ、いい！え、ちょっとエモい、カメラ近づこうかな。
subtitles.english: Ah, nice! Wow, that's pretty emotional, let's get the camera closer.

subtitles.original: よいしょ。うん。いいじゃん。あ、ちょっと目開くんか。
subtitles.english: Here we go. Yeah. That's good. Oh, you're opening your eyes a bit.

subtitles.original: いい、あ、めっちゃ可愛い、めっちゃ可愛いな、その顔可愛い。
subtitles.english: Nice, ah, super cute, that's so cute, that expression is cute.

subtitles.original: あ、めっちゃ、めっちゃいいよ、すごい、めっちゃ可愛い。
subtitles.english: Ah, really, that's really good, amazing, super cute.

subtitles.original: あらあら、あらあら。
subtitles.english: Oh my, oh my.

subtitles.original: 浜辺のマーメイドだ、マーメイド、美しい。
subtitles.english: She's a mermaid on the beach, a mermaid, beautiful.

subtitles.original: このステージで何をやってるんだろう。
subtitles.english: I wonder what she's doing on this stage.

subtitles.original: なかなかいいじゃないですか。
subtitles.english: Isn't this quite good?

subtitles.original: いや、こういう悩ましいお披露目はやっぱさ、
subtitles.english: I mean, this kind of seductive unveiling is, you know,

subtitles.original: 本当に。社長、あれかな、ちょっと雌みが...
subtitles.english: Really. CEO, is it just me, or is there a bit of a feminine...

subtitles.original: 雌みって言うな！
subtitles.english: Don't say "feminine"!

subtitles.original: ね、可愛い。
subtitles.english: Right, she's cute.

subtitles.original: みこも、社長と一緒に撮りたいな。
subtitles.english: I want to take a photo with the CEO too.

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ。撮る？じゃあ、すいちゃんにカメラ代わるよ。
subtitles.english: Ah, sure. Want to? Then, I'll switch the camera to Suichan.

subtitles.original: お、優しい！みこめ！
subtitles.english: Oh, how kind! Mikome!

subtitles.original: よいしょっと、よろしく。ちゃんと持ってもらってね。
subtitles.english: Here we go, please take care of it. Make sure you hold it properly.

subtitles.original: あ、あら！イエーイ！いいよ、社長、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Ah, oh! Yay! Looking good, CEO, cute!

subtitles.original: 美しい。あれ、みこち、なんか小さくない？
subtitles.english: Beautiful. Wait, Mikochi, aren't you a bit small?

subtitles.original: ちょっと社長、もう、ハグ、ハグとか、おねおねで。
subtitles.english: Wait, CEO, come on, a hug, give us a hug, please.

subtitles.original: あら、顔隠さないで。
subtitles.english: Oh, don't hide your face.

subtitles.original: ハグ、ハグ！
subtitles.english: Hug, hug!

subtitles.original: あ、ここら辺可愛い、幸せそうだ。
subtitles.english: Ah, this part is cute, you look happy.

subtitles.original: いいよ、もっと近づいて。はい、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Nice, get closer. Yes, cute!

subtitles.original: はい、ポーズ！
subtitles.english: Okay, pose!

subtitles.original: 可愛いね。
subtitles.english: Cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: いいね、じゃあ、ちょっとすいちゃんも。
subtitles.english: Nice, then, how about Suichan too.

subtitles.original: お、ポーズをさせていただきます。まずは下からカメラで攻めます。
subtitles.english: Oh, I'll strike a pose. First, I'll attack with the camera from below.

subtitles.original: いいね、足が。足がやべえ。
subtitles.english: Nice, the legs. The legs are incredible.

subtitles.original: 全身可愛い。いいよ、じゃあ、後ろとかも見せてください。
subtitles.english: Full body cute. Nice, then, please show us your back too.

subtitles.original: あら、可愛い。そこから社長、可愛い！
subtitles.english: Oh, cute. From there, CEO, cute!

subtitles.original: 背中美人、最強なんだが。綺麗。髪の毛も綺麗。
subtitles.english: A beauty from the back, she's the strongest. Beautiful. Her hair is beautiful too.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとさ、くるんって一回転してくださいよ。
subtitles.english: Hey, could you, like, do a quick spin?

subtitles.original: くるんって一回転？そう。
subtitles.english: A quick spin? Yeah.

subtitles.original: わあ！可愛い！
subtitles.english: Wow! Cute!

subtitles.original: エロみがすごいよ。
subtitles.english: The sexiness is amazing.

subtitles.original: 髪の毛がめっちゃサラサラなんだわ。
subtitles.english: Her hair is really silky smooth.

subtitles.original: シャンプーのCMみたいだ。セクシーでしょ。
subtitles.english: It's like a shampoo commercial. Sexy, isn't it?

subtitles.original: セクシー。社長の脇、脇。
subtitles.english: Sexy. CEO's armpits, armpits.

subtitles.original: みんな大好き脇、はい！
subtitles.english: Everyone's favorite armpits, here we go!

subtitles.original: いい、めっちゃいい！あ、なんか映り込もうとしてる奴がいる。
subtitles.english: Nice, really nice! Ah, looks like someone's trying to photobomb.

subtitles.original: 映り込むつもりはない、輝かせた脇を撮りたいだけなんだ。
subtitles.english: I'm not trying to photobomb, I just want to take a photo of those shining armpits.

subtitles.original: 脇に夢中だったわ。
subtitles.english: I was totally focused on the armpits.

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあ、ちょっと私もふーたんと撮ろうかな。
subtitles.english: Okay, then, I'll take a photo with Fuutan too.

subtitles.original: あら、待ってよ。
subtitles.english: Oh, wait a minute.

subtitles.original: 私が撮るよ、代わるよ。
subtitles.english: I'll take it, I'll switch.

subtitles.original: お前はええて！わちゃわちゃ、社長と撮りたいの。
subtitles.english: You're fine! *Commotion*, I want to take a photo with the CEO.

subtitles.original: そうだ、ポルカが撮る。かっこいい感じ、かっこいい感じ。
subtitles.english: Right, Polka will take it. Something cool, something cool.

subtitles.original: 背中合わせで。自撮りしようかな。
subtitles.english: Back to back. Should we take a selfie?

subtitles.original: あら、かっこいい、撮ってるふりをして。
subtitles.english: Oh, cool, pretend like you're taking one.

subtitles.original: あ、めっちゃいいじゃん！可愛いな！
subtitles.english: Ah, that's really good! So cute!

subtitles.original: これ、君らお揃いみたいだね、凄いわ。
subtitles.english: This, it looks like you two are matching, it's amazing.

subtitles.original: 等身がやばい。
subtitles.english: The proportions are crazy.

subtitles.original: あ、いい、自撮りできた！
subtitles.english: Ah, nice, I got the selfie!

subtitles.original: 可愛い、いい、二人とも。
subtitles.english: Cute, nice, both of you.

subtitles.original: あ、そうそう、そういうの、そういうの。
subtitles.english: Ah, right, right, like that, like that.

subtitles.original: いい、素晴らしい、素晴らしい。
subtitles.english: Nice, wonderful, wonderful.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: じゃ、ポルカも撮る、ポルカも撮る。
subtitles.english: Then, I'll take one of Polka too, I'll take one of Polka too.

subtitles.original: 私が撮る、私が撮る。
subtitles.english: I'll take it, I'll take it.

subtitles.original: ポルカプロデュースだよね、プロデュース。
subtitles.english: It's a Polka production, isn't it? Production.

subtitles.original: プロデュースさせて。
subtitles.english: Let me produce it.

subtitles.original: すいちゃんプロデュースしない、今は。
subtitles.english: I'm not producing Suichan right now.

subtitles.original: フレアをプロデュースする。いろんな顔して。
subtitles.english: I'm producing Flare. Make different expressions.

subtitles.original: あのさ、ちょっとさ、ハートとかさ、きゅってできたりする？
subtitles.english: You know, could you, like, make a heart shape, tightly?

subtitles.original: こういうこと？あ、それ！
subtitles.english: Like this? Ah, that's it!

subtitles.original: 社長、そんな顔していいんですか！
subtitles.english: CEO, is it okay to make an expression like that!?

subtitles.original: いい、完璧！おててを顎とかに乗せて。
subtitles.english: Nice, perfect! Put your hands under your chin.

subtitles.original: なんでそのボーズなんだよ。
subtitles.english: Why that pose?

subtitles.original: 顎とかに乗せてさ、ちょっとさ、上目遣いで...
subtitles.english: Put them under your chin, and then, with an upturned gaze...
